attributes.action: create equality in the United Kingdom by giving everyone free prescriptions and schooling and
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can the Welsh get free prescriptions and the Scottish get free schooling yet the English get to pay for these,  the British people should all get the same across the board.  Also how do the Scottish politicians get to vote on English matters yet the English cannot vote on the Scottish matters. Either we are all equal or lets all be seperate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
